CommentBody:
SELECT TOP (1000) [Domain]
      ,[Group]
      ,[Change]
      ,[Member Domain]
      ,[Member Display Name]
      ,[Member Type]
      ,[Member NT Account]
      ,[JobRunTimeKey]
      ,[When Discovered]
  FROM [StealthAUDIT].[dbo].[SA_AD_Changes_GroupMembershipChanges]


  SELECT TOP (1000)* FROM SA_ADActivity_EventsView
  WHERE ClassName = 'Group'

Your comment about the script for the group job looks good.
You could have a report watching activity details table for the specific path and host if you have it for the second request.
